summary:
Medical Biophysics: Proficient in the field of Medicine and Biophysics, specializing in functional diagnostics such as Electrocardiography, Echocardiography, Phonocardiography, Heart Rate Variability, Spirometry, Electroencephalography, Computed Tomography Diagnostics, Magnetic Resonance Imaging, Positron Emission Tomography, Ultrasound and Convetional X-ray.

Diagnostic Techniques: Experienced in utilizing advanced diagnostic techniques and equipment to assess and interpret medical data accurately. Skilled in conducting and analyzing ECG, PCG, EEG, HRV, Echo, spirometry tests, and interpreting results.

Teaching Methodology: Possess a postgraduate certificate in teaching methodology, showcasing expertise in effective teaching techniques and strategies. Able to impart knowledge and train individuals in Medical Biophysics concepts and techniques as well as in General Medicine.

Medical Research: Proficient in conducting clinical research studies, including study design, data collection, analysis, and interpretation. Familiar with research methodologies, statistical analysis, and scientific writing, ethical guidelines and regulatory requirements for conducting research in the medical field.

Patient Care: Dedicated to providing compassionate and comprehensive patient care. Skilled in performing medical examinations and collaborating with healthcare teams to develop treatment plans.

Problem-solving: Capable of analyzing complex medical data and applying critical thinking skills to identify and solve problems. Proficient in making accurate diagnoses and recommending appropriate treatment plans based on the findings.

Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, enabling effective interaction with patients, colleagues, and students. Able to explain complex medical concepts in a clear and understandable manner.

Multicultural Experience:  Trained in Russia for Seven years and gained exposure to diverse medical practices and healthcare systems. Familiar with working in cross-cultural environments and adapting to different professional settings. Adept at working collaboratively with interdisciplinary teams to deliver quality healthcare services. Able to communicate effectively, share knowledge, and contribute to the overall success of the team.

Time Management: Proficient in managing multiple tasks and prioritizing responsibilities effectively. Skilled at working in fast-paced environments, meeting deadlines, and delivering high-quality results.

school.name: Northern (Arctic) Federal University named after M. V. Lomonosov

profile_positions.title: Private Tutoring - Visceral Physiology and Functional Diagnostics

volunteer_experiences.role: My role involves assisting with echocardiography and 12-lead ECG interpretation
volunteer_experiences.description: Passionate about contributing to healthcare, I volunteer in the radiology and function check department. My role involves assisting with echocardiography and 12-lead ECG interpretation, supporting the team's efforts in providing accurate diagnostic insights.
